content: चिंता [चिंत्-भावे अ] {@--1@} Thinking, thought. {@--2@} Sad or sorrowful thought, care, anxiety; चिंताजडं दर्शनं <ls>Ś. 4. 5</ls>; so वीतचिंतः <ls n="Ś. 4.">12.</ls> {@--3@} Reflection, consideration. {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Anxiety, considered as one of the 33 subordinate feelings; ध्यानं चिंता हितानाप्तेः शून्यताश्वासतापकृत् <ls>S. D. 201.</ls>
